name: Queer LifeSpace
description: Sliding-scale mental health therapy starting at $20 per session
fullDescription: Queer LifeSpace provides low-cost mental health counseling, substance abuse services, and group therapy for the LGBTQ+ community on a sliding scale fee basis.
whatTheyOffer:
- Low-fee individual therapy
- Substance abuse counseling
- Group therapy sessions
- Couples counseling
- Sliding scale fees (some as low as $20)
- LGBTQ+-affirming therapists
howToGetIt:
1. Visit queerlifespace.org
2. Complete intake form
3. Schedule consultation
4. Discuss fee based on income
5. Begin therapy services
keywords: Queer LifeSpace, San Francisco, LGBTQ, gay, lesbian, trans, queer, mental health, therapy, counseling, substance abuse, sliding scale, $20, group therapy, couples counseling
